nodes.text: "The Millennium Falcon" is the second issue of Altaya's Star Wars Encyclopedia. It features the Millennium Falcon. It was released on August 19, 2020.

Many ships have crisscrossed space over the centuries, but few are as famous as the Millennium Falcon.  Originally a simple freighter, the Falcon passed through the hands of several owners before making history during the Galactic Civil War.
